mapper.insert: INSERT INTO REVIEW (REVIEW_NO, CONTENT, ENROLL_DATE, IMG, MEMBER_NO, RATING, ORDER_NO) VALUES (SEQ_REVIEW_NO.NEXTVAL, #{content}, #{enrollDate}, #{img}, #{memberNo}, #{rating}, #{orderNo})
mapper.select: SELECT R.REVIEW_NO , R.CONTENT , M.NICK , P.PRODUCT_NO , P.NAME AS P_NAME , TO_CHAR (R.ENROLL_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS ENROLL_DATE , R.IMG , R.RATING , R.DEL_YN FROM REVIEW R JOIN MEMBER M ON M.MEMBER_NO = R.MEMBER_NO JOIN ORDERS_LIST L ON L.ORDER_LIST_NO = R.ORDER_LIST_NO JOIN ORDERS O ON O.ORDER_NO = L.ORDER_NO JOIN PRODUCT P ON P.PRODUCT_NO = O.PRODUCT_NO ORDER BY REVIEW_NO DESC OFFSET #{pageNo} ROWS FETCH NEXT #{limit} ROWS ONLY

SELECT R.REVIEW_NO , R.CONTENT , M.NICK , P.PRODUCT_NO , P.NAME AS P_NAME , TO_CHAR (R.ENROLL_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS ENROLL_DATE , R.IMG , R.RATING , R.DEL_YN FROM REVIEW R JOIN MEMBER M ON M.MEMBER_NO = R.MEMBER_NO JOIN ORDERS_LIST L ON L.ORDER_LIST_NO = R.ORDER_LIST_NO JOIN ORDERS O ON O.ORDER_NO = L.ORDER_NO JOIN PRODUCT P ON P.PRODUCT_NO = O.PRODUCT_NO ORDER BY REVIEW_NO DESC

SELECT R.REVIEW_NO , R.CONTENT , M.NICK , P.PRODUCT_NO , P.NAME , TO_CHAR (R.ENROLL_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS ENROLL_DATE , R.IMG , R.RATING , R.DEL_YN FROM REVIEW R JOIN MEMBER M ON M.MEMBER_NO = R.MEMBER_NO JOIN ORDERS_LIST L ON L.ORDER_LIST_NO = R.ORDER_LIST_NO JOIN ORDERS O ON O.ORDER_NO = L.ORDER_NO JOIN PRODUCT P ON P.PRODUCT_NO = O.PRODUCT_NO WHERE R.REVIEW_NO = #{reviewNo}
